summary:
The UEFA Nations League is a football tournament for European countries. The fourth tournament will start in September 2024 and end in March 2026. It will have different stages, including league play and knockout rounds.

Spain is the current champion, winning the 2023 final. The upcoming tournament will feature exciting matches, with teams competing to become the new champions. The winner will be decided in the final stage in June 2025.
